title: Riven's now incredibly fast combo
body:
After not playing for half a week, there's this magical update making riven magically does her fast q combo really fast 
now all a riven player has to do is do an auto click right after the q animation finishes to get the fast combo

HOWEVER they can now do the riot-endorsed supercombo by clicking as fast as a vaynemayne on full build.
After some testing, I've found that the "fast combo" not done fast enough (as in the orbwalk click thing), becomes more of a q>walk away>walk back>auto (aka the really slow combo)

with riven's lvl 18 attack speed,and the combo, she pretty much does her auto attack in her q animation which means she now gets some insane damage output 
and 6(or so) stacks of fervor in just over a second. wow. (won't be surprised to see riven appear midway through worlds)

idk what to think but for now, much op many wow rito nerf pls 



sorry for excessive rant + wall of text (though this adds to it :P)

replies.body:
This is a bug BTW, **Riot** is looking to fix it by at least the next patch. 

More info [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/56224t/with_the_new_620_patch_riven_can_get_an_insane/d8fqd3c).
